name: ObservationCategoryCodes
title: Observation Category Codes
description: Codes to denote a guideline or policy statement.when a genetic test result is being shared as a secondary finding.

concept.definition: First release (2013): ACMG Recommendations for Reporting of Incidental Findings in Clinical Exome and Genome Sequencing.  https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3727274/

Second release (2016): Recommendations for reporting of secondary findings in clinical exome and genome sequencing, 2016 update (ACMG SF v2.0): a policy statement of the American College of Medical Genetics and Genomics. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/27854360
